text: In September and October 2023, every municipal council in Norway, held elections to choose mayor. Four years later, the municipal councils will elect mayors, again. (Names were added to this page, as late as 2024's fourth quarter.) ==Mayors of municipalities== *Alstahaug municipality. The Centre Party, the Conservative Party, the Red Party, and the Liberal Party had the votes that elected Peter Talseth .https://www.kommunal- rapport.no/kommunevalg/her-far-du-den-store-ordforeroversikten/154578!/. Retrieved 2023-10-26https://www.hblad.no/2023/nyheter/alstahaug-sp-hoyre-rodt- og-venstre-lager-flertall/. Hblad.no. Retrieved 2023-10-0516:17 Talseth får fire nye år med ordførerklubba. Retrieved 2023-10-06 He is a member of the Centre Party. Furthermore, the municipality is in Nordland (county). *Alta. The Labour Party, the Liberal Party, Socialist Left Party, Red Party, Centre Party, and KrF had the votes that elected Monica Nielsen as mayor; The mayor is a member of the Labour Party.https://www.nrk.no/tromsogfinnmark/valget-i- troms-og-finnmark-2023-1.16397013. Retrieved 2023-10-09 The party with the most votes in the local election (2023), is the Progress Party; It has 9 council members (of the 35).https://www.nrk.no/valg/2023/resultat/fylke/56/5601. NRK.no. Retrieved 2023-09-27 Furthermore, Finnmark is the county again, since 2024. (Troms og Finnmark was the county). *Alvdal. Centre Party; Mona Murud. *Alver, Norway.
